images.caption: Figure 1:TheFrankentextspipeline. First, random paragraphs are sampled from a large corpus of human-written books. Then, an LLM is prompted with the paragraphs, a writing prompt, and instructions to include a certain percentage of verbatim human text, to generate the first draft of aFrankentext. Further edits can be made by the same model to produce a coherent and faithful final version. See Algorithm1for the pipeline’s pseudocode.

Figure 2:Detection rates among 6 annotators and 3 detectors (Pangram, Binoculars, FastDetectGPT) on the 30 GeminiFrankentextsused for human evaluation. We count mixed, highly likely and likely AI labels in Pangram’s detection rate. Theredline represents annotators’ average detection rate.
Figure 3:Effects of varying the percentage of required verbatim copy on thePangram AI detection rate(mixed, highly likely, and likely AI labels),copy rate, orcoherenceof theFrankentexts.
